com.simsilica.lemur

Class Checkbox

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.scene.Spatial

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme3.asset.CloneableSmartAsset, com.jme3.collision.Collidable, com.jme3.export.Savable, com.jme3.util.clone.JmeCloneable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Checkbox
extends Button
    A standard Checkbox GUI element that can be used to toggle a boolean state represented by a CheckboxModel.
